metadata.title: CVE-2016-2112

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP1

metadata.description: The bundled LDAP client library in Samba 3.x and 4.x before 4.2.11, 4.3.x before 4.3.8, and 4.4.x before 4.4.2 does not recognize the "client ldap sasl wrapping" setting, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to perform LDAP protocol-downgrade attacks by modifying the client-server data stream.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP2 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3 is installed
